title: Batgirl, Vol. 1: Silent Knight
description: Cassandra Cain is a fighter like no other. At only 17, the teenage assassin takes down enemies three times her size without batting an eye. But her incredible skills come at a cost: unable to speak or write, Cassandra instead reads body language as naturally as breathing-an ability that makes her even deadlier.After Batman witnesses her save the life of Commissioner Gordon during the events of No Manâ€™s Land, the Dark Knight sees in Cassandra the successor to the Batgirl name. Now, under the tutelage of Barbara Gordon-the original Batgirl herself-Cassandra Cain must find a new purpose and make amends for her violent past.But can someone who was born to kill ever be worthy to take up the cowl of a fallen legend?Collects BATGIRL #1-12 and BATGIRL ANNUAL #1.
author: Kelley Puckett
